QuestData.Title: Gauging Our Progress
QuestData.Description: The time for war is at hand, $n!$b$bWe've been training these natives non-stop since you left, and I believe they're as good as they're going to get.$b$bSee for yourself. Check in with the others and return with your findings.$b$bWe must rely on our enemy being somehow... even less prepared.
QuestData.LogDescription: Check in with Shademaster Kiryn, Rivett Clutchpop, Shokia, and Riko.
